Audio.Locality: Hotel Donati, Itatiaia NP, Rio de Janeiro state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural vocalizations from pair at edge of opening beside montane forest. Some duetting.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Phyllomyias griseocapilla,Megarynchus pitangua,Baryphthengus ruficapillus,Cyclarhis gujanensis,Myiarchus swainsoni,Attila rufus
